resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/64767</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>64767</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Rectas notables de un triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">Lines associated with a triangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnet verbundenes mit einem Dreieck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Raye associé à une triangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinha associado com um triângulo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinea collegato con un triangolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές που συνδέονται με ένα τρίγωνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las rectas y puntos notables de un triángulo. Se estudian mediatrices, medianas, bisectrices, alturas y los puntos en los que se cortan mediante simulaciones en las que se pueden visualizar diferentes triángulos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show the lines and points associated with a triangle. Several visuals with different triangles show perpendicular bisectors, medians, angle bisectors, altitudes and the points where they intersect.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mediatriz</string>
            <string language="en">perpendicular bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mediana</string>
            <string language="en">median</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bisectriz</string>
            <string language="en">angle bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">altura</string>
            <string language="en">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, zum der Zeilen und der Punkte zu zeigen mit 
einem Dreieck verband. Einige Sichtbarmachungen mit 
unterschiedlichen Dreiecken zeigen Senkrechtbisectors, Mittelpunkte, 
Winkel bisectors, Höhen und die Punkte, in denen sie schneiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations pour montrer les lignes et les points a associées à 
une triangle. Plusieurs visuels avec différentes triangles 
montrent des bisectors perpendiculaires, des médianes, des bisectors 
d'angle, des altitudes et les points où ils intersectent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos para 
mostrar as linhas e os pontos associou com um triângulo. 
Diversos visuals com triângulos diferentes mostram bisectors 
perpendiculares, números médios, bisectors do ângulo, alturas e os 
pontos onde se cruzam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi per 
mostrare le righe ed i punti ha associato con un triangolo. 
Parecchie rappresentazioni con differenti triangoli mostrano i 
bisectors perpendicolari, le mediane, i bisectors di angolo, le 
altezze ed i punti in cui intersecano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εμφανίσει τις γραμμές και σημεία σύνδεσε με 
ένα τρίγωνο. Διάφορα visuals με τα διαφορετικά τρίγωνα 
εμφανίζουν τα κάθετα bisectors, τις διαμέσους, τα bisectors 
γωνίας, τα ύψη και τα σημεία όπου κόβουν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Senkrechtbisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mittlere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bisector perpendiculaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">médian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bisector d'angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bisector perpendicular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mediano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bisector do ângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">altura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bisector perpendicolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mediano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bisector di angolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">altezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάθετος διαχωριστικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεσαίος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία διαχωριστική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύψος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
